summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Housing and Building Maintenance Code, deleting SMC Section 22.202.060 relating to rental housing registration, amending SMC Section 22.206.160 (C)(1), 22.206.160 (C)(5), 22.206.230 and 22.206.240 to delete reference to rental housing registration, and amending SMC Section 22.206.280 to delete reference to rental housing registration and to correct an incorrect reference to SMC Section 22.206.160.
